name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech

Proficient in designing **API** integrations, implementing **event-driven architectures**, and executing **CI/CD** strategies to ensure seamless deployment. Experienced in developing AI/ML-powered platforms with a focus on predictive analytics, automation, and real-time data processing, while ensuring compliance with industry standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS.
